DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1 , Single Dose Study Evaluate Safety Pharmacokinetics MEDI0382 Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: This first-time-in-humans ( FTIH ) , randomize , double-blind study design evaluate safety , tolerability , PK MEDI0382 administer single-ascending SC dose healthy subject ( age 18-45 ) . Eight subject per cohort enrol total 8 cohort . The decision whether dose escalate base upon data review Dose Escalation Committee ( DEC ) . Within cohort , subject randomize MEDI0382 placebo ( 3:1 ) . Following screening , study duration subject approximately 29 day , consist inpatient evaluation period , outpatient follow-up period .
DOC.criteria: Healthy Volunteers , age 1845 Must provide write informed consent BMI > 22 < 30 kg/m2 body weight > 70kg Venous access suitable multiple cannulation Vital sign within normal specified range Females must nonlactating nonchildbearing potential Males must practice 2 effective contraceptive measure sexually active Any concurrent condition opinion investigator would interfere evaluation investigational product History presence gastrointestinal , renal , hepatic disease condition know interfere absorption , distribution , metabolism , excretion drug History cancer , exception nonmelanoma skin cancer Any clinically important illness , medical/surgical procedure , trauma within 4 week prior dose Positive Hepatitis B , Hepatitis C HIV test use antiretroviral medication screen . Concurrent previous use GLP1 receptor agonist Current previous use systemic corticosteroid within past 28 day prior screen Use medicinal product herbal preparation license control body weight appetite prohibit . Known suspected history alcohol drug abuse within past 3 year . Positive drug screen Current smoker
